text: mema kuranaya arabi novana bhasavakin api pahala kara tibune nam, (mema makkavasin) “mehi ayavan (apage arabi bhasaven) vivaranaya kara pavasa tibiya yutu noveda? meya nam arabi novana bhasavaki. api nam (eya nodanna) arabivarunya” yayi niyata vasayenma pavasanu æta. (nabiye!) oba mese pavasanu: “meya (ovunge arabi bhasaven tikhena atara) visvasaya tæbuvanta rju margayak vasayenda, (usas) nivaranayak vasayenda ætteya. kavurun visvasa nokaloda, ovunge kanvala bihiribhavaya ætteya. (ovun sambandhayen nam), eya (ovunge) æs penuma vasa ganna tirayak vasayen ætteya. ovun (oba asala sitiya vuvada), itamat æta epita sita aradhana karannak (men ætteya)
